mapper.insert: INSERT INTO couple_user SET uid = #{uid}, upw = #{upw}, nm = #{nm}, pic = #{pic}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, started_at = #{startedAt}
mapper.select: SELECT a.cuser userId, b.ccouple coupleId, uid, upw, nm, pic, birth, started_at startedAt, gender FROM couple_user a INNER JOIN couple b ON a.cuser = b.cwoman OR a.cuser = b.cman WHERE a.uid = #{uid}

SELECT A.cuser, A.nm, A.pic, C.pic as partnerPic, A.birth, A.started_at AS startedAt FROM couple_user AS A JOIN couple AS B ON A.gender = 'M' AND B.cman = A.cuser OR A.gender = 'W' AND B.cwoman = A.cuser JOIN couple_user AS C ON A.gender = 'M' AND B.cwoman = C.cuser OR A.gender = 'W' AND B.cman = C.cuser WHERE B.ccouple = #{coupleId} ORDER BY A.cuser = #{userId} DESC
mapper.update: update couple_user set nm = #{nm}, pic = #{pic}, birth = #{birth}, started_at = #{startedAt} where cuser = #{userId}
